overview: Three strangers wake up suddenly on a descending elevator. To their horror, Clare, Ross, and Jeb soon realize that they are all karmically linked in a deeper way than meets the eye, and that this elevator symbolizes a passage to the afterlife. In a deeply haunting and claustrophobic examination of fate vs. destiny, the three discover that what is waiting on the other side of the elevator doors is created by their own beliefs.
title: The Land of Two Fields
